headline: How the U.S. is Handing Over Venezuela’s Oil Sector to China
summary: While not officially taking over Chevron’s assets, Chinese companies like China Concord Petroleum and Anhui Guangda Mining are signing secretive production-sharing deals to operate oil fields and pursue greenfield projects.

raw.headline: How the U.S. is Handing Over Venezuela’s Oil Sector to China

headline: 2 Stocks Down 23% and 26% to Buy Right Now
summary: If investors can see past the downturn in energy prices, Chevron stock is a great opportunity.  Exponential AI demand growth is driving this company's end-market growth.  With the first half of 2025 nearly over, many investors are taking time to reevaluate their portfolios and take advantage of quality stocks that can be bought at a discount.

headline: Two Alternatives For A Potential $5000 Monthly Income
